title: Professional Events
description: Developing students' professionalism through 30+ networking events, technical skill building events, recruiting sessions, career information events, and more!

title: Social Events
description: Providing a community of 100+ students to connect and have fun through game nights, organization socials, study sessions, the Big data/Little Data program, and more!

title: Projects
description: Assisting students with 25+ projects to gain practical data-science experience by working on real-world problems, in collaboration with both faculty and industry.

title: Workshops
description: Lecturing 20+ workshops throughout the year for students of all skill levels on technical topics, including Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Scalable Analytics, Pandas, and more!
